comment: It has been open season on Trump supporters since Day One at the inauguration. I was there in DC. I saw them rioting and years later not a single one of those people have anything to worry about from Jeff Sessions and the inept DOJ. It has been worse in California than anywhere else Moral of the story: stay the fuck out of it
